scripts.migrate_up: DATABASE_URL=postgres://$(grep POSTGRES_USER ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PASSWORD ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)@$(grep POSTGRES_HOST ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PORT ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)/$(grep POSTGRES_DB ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) node-pg-migrate up
scripts.migrate_down: DATABASE_URL=postgres://$(grep POSTGRES_USER ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PASSWORD ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)@$(grep POSTGRES_HOST ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PORT ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)/$(grep POSTGRES_DB ./src/database/.env | cut -d '=' -f2) node-pg-migrate down
